magic_damage+5%.title: +5% Magic Damage
magic_damage+5%.description: +5% More Magic Damage, which allows to deal more Magic Damage

magic_resistance+5%.title: +5% Magic Resistance
magic_resistance+5%.description: 5% More Magic Resistance, become immune to Magic Attacks!

magic_resistance_shred+5%.title: +5% Magic Resistance Shred
magic_resistance_shred+5%.description: 5% More Magic Resistance Shred, decreases Magic Res Attribute for the attacked entity making it easier to kill with Magic Damage!

data.command: say Added 5% more Magic Resistance Shred!

information.title: Information
information.description: What Deals Magic Damage? 'Instant Damage, Poison, Instant Health(Undead Mobs), E-Dragon Breath Attack, Evoker Fang, Conduit Attack'. Player can deal Instant Damage to Normal Mobs and Instant Health to Undead Mobs(Zombie,Skeleton) only with these 2 you can receive XP!
